Actions.Name: Copy All Area Of Widget To Clipboard
Actions.Tooltip: Copy the entire target widget as an image to the clipboard.

Actions.Name: Copy Selected Area Of Widget To Clipboard
Actions.Tooltip: Copy the selected area of the target widget to the clipboard as an image.

Actions.Name: Print All Area Of Widget
Actions.Tooltip: Outputs the entire target widget as an image file.

Actions.Name: Print Selected Area Of Widget
Actions.Tooltip: Outputs the selected area of the target widget as an image file.

Actions.Name: Restore Widget From Image File
Actions.Tooltip:
Restores the state of the widget from the image file.
You can only restore from images output from this plugin.

Actions.Name: Open Export Destination Folder
Actions.Tooltip: Open the folder containing the images saved by this plugin in explorer.

Author: Naotsun
Description: A plugin that allows you to call the functions of Graph Printer, a plugin for Unreal Engine, from Stream Deck.
Name: Graph Printer
